decks.notes: This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming your opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and burn spells. The key strategy revolves around dealing damage quickly and efficiently, using cards like Marauding Mako and Torch the Tower to control the board while pushing for damage with creatures like Steamcore Scholar and Vivi Ornitier. The deck also utilizes card draw and mana fixing to ensure consistency and staying power throughout the game. By applying constant pressure and maintaining a strong presence on the board, this deck aims to close out games swiftly and decisively.

This deck focuses on utilizing a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and control the board. The key strategy involves applying early pressure with efficient creatures like Deep-Cavern Bat and Floodpits Drowner, while using cards like Essence Scatter and Phantom Interference to disrupt the opponent's game plan. By maintaining a balance between aggression and disruption, the deck aims to dictate the pace of the game and secure a victory through a mix of creature combat and spell-based control.

This Orzhov Control deck focuses on controlling the board through removal spells and disruptive cards in order to grind out the opponent's resources. The deck aims to slow down the opponent's game plan while generating card advantage with cards like Mazemind Tome and Deadly Cover-Up. Authority of the Consuls helps to gain life and prevent aggressive strategies, while Beza, the Bounding Spring and Ketramose, the New Dawn provide powerful late-game threats. The mana base is designed to support a mix of black and white spells while also providing enough colored sources to cast the deck's powerful spells consistently.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a combination of blue and red cards that enable quick damage output and disruption. It utilizes a variety of creatures and spells to apply pressure on the opponent, while also utilizing card draw and removal spells to maintain board control. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with fast, efficient creatures and burn spells, while also using disruptive spells to prevent the opponent from mounting a defense. The deck aims to win the game quickly by consistently attacking the opponent's life total and controlling the battlefield.

This deck focuses on quickly applying pressure to the opponent with a mix of creatures and spells, while also controlling the board with disruption. It utilizes a combination of evasive creatures like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner, alongside powerful threats like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Deep-Cavern Bat. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Shoot the Sheriff and Phantom Interference, while also maintaining card advantage with Enduring Curiosity and Tishana's Tidebinder. By combining aggression and control, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.

The deck focuses on utilizing various cards like Lost in the Maze, Consult the Star Charts, and Stock Up to set up the combo of Omniscience and Roiling Dragonstorm. By ramping up mana with cards like Uthros, Titanic Godcore and Evendo, Waking Haven, the player can quickly cast big spells for free. Additional support from cards like Dispelling Exhale and Cavern of Souls help protect the combo pieces while cards like unauthorized Exit and Bounce Off provide control and removal options. Kona, Rescue Beastie and Marang River Regent offer additional threats and card advantage.

The main concept of this deck is to assemble a specific combination of cards that allows the player to cast Omniscience for free, enabling them to play powerful spells without paying their mana cost. Cards like Roiling Dragonstorm and Uthros, Titanic Godcore help set up the combo, while Consult the Star Charts and Stock Up provide card advantage and consistency. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Dispelling Exhale and Lost in the Maze to control the game until the combo can be assembled and win the game.

The key concept of this deck is to overwhelm your opponent quickly with aggressive creatures and damage spells. The strategy involves playing low-cost creatures like Marauding Mako and Vivi Ornitier to apply early pressure, while also using disruptive spells like Into the Flood Maw and Abrade to control the board. The deck benefits from spells like Fear of Missing Out and Winternight Stories that provide card advantage and versatility. The deck aims to outpace the opponent and end the game before they have a chance to stabilize.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on a fast and aggressive playstyle, utilizing a mix of removal spells like Lightning Helix and Shoot the Sheriff to clear the opponent's board while bringing out powerful creatures like Cecil, Dark Knight and Preacher of the Schism to quickly pressure the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Dark Confidant and Origin of Spider-Man to provide card advantage and ensure consistent threats on the battlefield. With a strong mana base and versatile spells, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent early on and secure a swift victory.

The focus of this Red Deck Wins Aggro deck is to overwhelm opponents with fast, direct damage and aggressive creatures. The deck includes a mix of low-cost creatures like Burnout Bashtronaut and Razorkin Needlehead, along with powerful spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike. Soulstone Sanctuary and Rockface Village provide extra utility, while Nova Hellkite acts as a powerful finisher. The goal is to quickly deplete the opponent's life total while maintaining pressure on the board with efficient creatures and burn spells.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to utilize a variety of aggressive creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By efficiently utilizing cards like Winternight Stories, Agatha's Soul Cauldron, and Marauding Mako, the deck aims to establish board control early and maintain pressure throughout the game. With a focus on tempo and aggression, along with the inclusion of cards like Artist's Talent and Into the Flood Maw for disruption, this deck seeks to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent in order to secure a swift victory.

The main focus of this Red Deck Wins aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of fast, aggressive creatures and direct burn spells. By consistently applying pressure with efficient creatures like Emberheart Challenger and Nova Hellkite, while also utilizing burn spells such as Lightning Strike and Burst Lightning to finish off opponents or clear blockers, this deck aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero. With a lean curve and an emphasis on proactive plays, this deck seeks to set a fast pace and dictate the flow of the game.

This deck focuses on creating a fast and aggressive board presence by utilizing cards that synergize well with each other, such as Gene Pollinator and Spyglass Siren. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with early threats like Llanowar Elves and flood the board with creatures like Ouroboroid and Floodpits Drowner. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Jackal, Genius Geneticist and Tyvar, the Pummeler for additional support and power, while also utilizing cards like Multiversal Passage for consistency and fixing. Overall, the deck aims to quickly build a strong board presence and pressure the opponent into submission.

This deck focuses on gaining control of the game through a combination of removal spells, card draw, and powerful creatures. The key strategy involves setting up a strong defensive position with cards like Lightning Helix and Get Lost, while gradually gaining card advantage with Jeskai Revelation and Consult the Star Charts. Ultimate is used as a finisher to close out games once the opponent's resources have been depleted. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's color requirements and ensure a smooth curve throughout the game.

This deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and direct damage spells in order to quickly reduce their life total to zero. It also includes cards that help draw more cards and facilitate casting multiple spells in a turn, maximizing the deck's efficiency and tempo advantage. The deck's mana base is carefully constructed to ensure a smooth curve and consistent access to the colors needed for spells.

The main concept of this Dimir Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of low-cost, aggressive creatures like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner, while also utilizing control elements like Phantom Interference and Shoot the Sheriff to disrupt their game plan. The deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent while also providing some card advantage and removal options with cards like Enduring Curiosity and Tragic Trajectory. Additionally, the inclusion of Tishana's Tidebinder and Restless Reef allows for some tempo plays and evasion to sneak in damage.
